email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Account Suspension Notification

Dear Valued Customer,

We regret to inform you that your Bank of America account has been flagged for suspicious activity and will be temporarily suspended as a security measure. This action has been taken to protect your funds and personal information from potential fraudsters.

To prevent any further unauthorized access to your account, we kindly request that you verify your identity by clicking on the link below and providing the necessary information. Failure to do so may result in permanent suspension of your account.

[Phishing Link]

Please note that this is a time-sensitive matter and failure to comply within the next 24 hours will result in the permanent closure of your account. We understand the inconvenience this may cause, but your security is our top priority.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
Bank of America Security Team
